On Thu, Jun 18, 2009 at 3:53 PM, P Baker <me@...> wrote:

> I thi=
nk rearranging some of the logic would work. The use case is
> this: @Param=
eters connects to a database to populate an array of
> parameters, however,=
 the database connection is instantiated in a
> @BeforeClass method. This i=
s my definition of 'lazy loading', the
> parameters are not known at compil=
e time, but only at run time.
>
FYI, TestNG implements that by allowing a d=
ata provider to return an
Iterator instead of an array, which allows you to=
 defer the creation of the
parameters until just before the test method is =
invoked.

Maybe the same idea can be implemented in JUnit.

--
